name: A Way To Be Dead
description:
A Way to be Dead is an asymmetrical multiplayer (4 vs 1) horror game where a bewildered doctor is on the hunt for a group of survivors who are just trying to survive. This game where the players can take on the role of Dr. Riley, the survivors or even the zombies, takes place in the universe of another title developed by Crania Games, Roots of Insanity. And it provides us with the opportunity to see the happenings from different perspectives.


Game Features


◆ Different pre-designed paths that change randomly on each session, see a different part each game.
◆ Playable as zombies, survivors and Dr. Riley
◆ Ability to improve the character using the Therapy points you gain by winning a session
◆ Ability to use the various environmental interactions for an intensified gameplay experience. You can make it easier for yourself to reach your next target or hinder your opponents' efforts.
◆ When playing as a survivor you can carry only a single object at any given time. Due to this limitation, it is wise to stick with the other survivors.
◆ Customize all the variables in a match. Duration until the lights are shut off, the amount of zombies, loot ratios, the number of exits, etc.
